shape.description: The shape or form of the object

material.description: The material the object is made of

size.description: The size or dimensions of the object

weight.description: The weight or mass of the object

texture.description: The surface texture of the object

function.description: The primary function or purpose of the object

origin.description: The place or culture of origin of the object

age.description: The age or time period of the object

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or producer of the object

brand.description: The brand associated with the object

location.description: The current location of the object

value.description: The monetary value of the object

capacity.description: The capacity or volume of the object

energy.description: The energy content or usage of the object

speed.description: The speed or velocity of the object

power.description: The power output or consumption of the object

lifespan.description: The expected lifespan or durability of the object

composition.description: The chemical composition of the object

symbolism.description: The symbolic meaning or representation of the object

usage.description: The typical usage or application of the object

classification.description: The classification or category of the object
